perturbation.original_text: Such services may include development of risk management programs, production of portfolio and compliance reports for clients and/or fund Boards, coordination of client portfolios and related fixed income trade execution implementation and administration, completion of required broker and custody documentation, development and documentation of operational procedures, coordination of proxy voting activities, on-site support of hardware and software, etc.
perturbation.changed_text: Such services may include development of risk management programs, coordination of client portfolios and related fixed income trade execution implementation and administration, completion of required broker and custody documentation, development and documentation of operational procedures, on-site support of hardware and software, etc.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'production of portfolio and compliance reports for clients and/or fund Boards' eliminates a critical aspect of mandated regulatory compliance. Investment advisors have a legal and fiduciary duty to provide regular and accurate reporting to their clients and fund boards. Omission of this duty creates a loophole where Federated Advisory Services Company (FASC) is not explicitly bound to this crucial service.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Investment Company Act of 1940, specifically sections related to reporting requirements and fiduciary duties.
perturbation.location: Section 1 - Amendment to Exhibit A to Services Agreement

perturbation.original_text: This Amendment shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment shall be governed by the laws applicable to the parties.
perturbation.explanation: By omitting the specific jurisdiction of 'the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania' and replacing it with a general statement, the contract creates ambiguity about which laws govern the agreement. This vagueness can be used to evade consumer protection laws or regulatory requirements that are specific to Pennsylvania, such as those related to investment advisory services and fiduciary responsibilities.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Pennsylvania state laws and regulations governing investment advisory services.

perturbation.original_text: Employees of Federated Advisory Services Company provide support to portfolio managers and other employees of affiliated advisers.
perturbation.changed_text: Federated Advisory Services Company may provide support to portfolio managers and other employees of affiliated advisers.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Employees of Federated Advisory Services Company provide support' to 'Federated Advisory Services Company may provide support' weakens the obligation to provide the mentioned support. This implies the support is optional instead of mandatory, allowing FASC to avoid liabilities related to the failure to offer necessary support to portfolio managers. Portfolio support might be viewed as optional, directly affecting the standard of care delivered.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied duty of care under Pennsylvania law for investment advisory services.
perturbation.location: Section 1 - Amendment to Exhibit A to Services Agreement
